DrugName: Lactate-lowering agents such as dichloroacetate or sodium lactate
Bronchodilators like albuterol to help with stridor and breathing difficulties
Muscle relaxants including baclofen for involuntary movements and muscle spasms
Anticonvulsants like valproic acid or levetiracetam for seizure disorder/PNES management
Pain relief medications such as pregabalin, gabapentin, or clonidine for fibromyalgia
Metformin to manage pre-diabetes and PCOS-related insulin resistance
Antibiotics like doxycycline for chronic Lyme disease, babesiosis, ehrlichiosis, rickettsia, and relapsing fever
Pentosan polysulfate sodium (Elmiron) for interstitial cystitis
Dexlansoprazole (Dexilant) for uterine fibroids-related gastrointestinal issues
